school: Biomedical Sciences School, Chemistry & Molec Biosciences, Medicine Faculty, Biomedical Sciences School, Chemistry & Molec Biosciences,
description: This course will introduce students to the study of clinically focused biomedical sciences using case-based learning approach that will be supported by a combination of lectures, practical sessions, expert tutorials and symposia. The course will include the following modules: Infection and Immunity, Cardiovascular, Respiratory and Renal.
